dmca.title: [ABUSE] Takedown Notification [Notice ID: 39193]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, October 19, 2004 10:00 AM
To: borland@copyright-compliance.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Takedown Notification [Notice ID: 39193]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our legal counsel (copyright@theplanet.com)
for review.
- --
Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

borland@copyright-compliance.com wrote:
| ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
| 1333 Stemmons Frwy - Suite 110
|
|
|
|
|
| Re:  Unauthorized Use of "Borland" Property
| Notice ID:39193
| Notice  Date:18 Oct 2004 20:14:05 GMT
|
|
| Dear Sir or Madam:
|
| Borland Software Corporation ("Borland") and its affiliated companies
(collectively, "Borland") are the owners of copyrights in the software
products listed below.
|
| We have received information that one of your users as identified by
the IP address listed below may have engaged in the unauthorized copying
and distribution of Borland's software products, by copying,
distributing and offering them for download via the Internet.
|
| This unauthorized copying and distribution constitutes copyright
infringement under Section 106 of the U.S. Copyright Act.  Depending
upon the type of service ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. is
providing to this IP address, it may have legal and/or equitable
liability if it does not expeditiously remove or disable access to the
(property)(s) listed below, or if it fails to implement a policy that
provides for termination of subscribers who are repeat infringers (see,
17 U.S.C.
